edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.database

Class DiskMapRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.database.DiskMapRecords
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NoSQLRecords

    public class DiskMapRecords
extends Object
implements NoSQLRecords
    Uses a diskmap as the primary database with mongo as the backup for when we need more NoSQL databasey features. See DiskMapCollection for more details.
    Author:
    westy, arun

      Creates an index for the given field.

      Create a new record (row) with the given name using the JSONObject.
      JSONObject lookupEntireRecord(String collection, String name)
      For the record with given name, return the entire record as a JSONObject.
      HashMap<ColumnField,Object> lookupSomeFields(String collection, String name, ColumnField nameField, ColumnField valuesMapField, ArrayList<ColumnField> valuesMapKeys)

      Print all the records (ONLY FOR DEBUGGING).
      void removeEntireRecord(String collection, String name)
      Remove the record with the given name.
      void removeMapKeys(String collection, String name, ColumnField mapField, ArrayList<ColumnField> mapKeys)
      For record with name, removes (unset) keys in list mapKeys from the map mapField.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecords(String collection, ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, Object value)
      Given a key and a value return all the records as a AbstractRecordCursor that have a *user* key with that value.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsNear(String collection, ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, String value, Double maxDistance)
      If key is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that are near value which is a point specified as a JSONArray string tuple: [LONG, LAT].
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsQuery(String collection, ColumnField valuesMapField, String query)
      Performs a query on the database and returns all guids that satisfy the query.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsWithin(String collection, ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, String value)
      If key is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArray string tuple of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]] The returned value is a AbstractRecordCursor.
      void updateEntireRecord(String collection, String name, ValuesMap valuesMap)
      For the record with given name, replace the values of given fields to the given values.
      void updateIndividualFields(String collection, String name, ColumnField valuesMapField, ArrayList<ColumnField> valuesMapKeys, ArrayList<Object> valuesMapValues)
      THE ONLY METHOD THAT CURRENTLY SUPPORTS WRITING USER JSON OBJECTS AS VALUES IN THE VALUES MAP.

      • selectRecordsWithin

        public AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsWithin(String collection,
                                                ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                                String key,
                                                String value)
                                         throws FailedDBOperationException
        Description copied from interface: NoSQLRecords
        If key is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArray string tuple of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]] The returned value is a AbstractRecordCursor.
        Specified by:
        selectRecordsWithin in interface NoSQLRecords
        Returns:
        AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • selectRecordsNear

        public AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsNear(String collection,
                                              ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                              String key,
                                              String value,
                                              Double maxDistance)
                                       throws FailedDBOperationException
        Description copied from interface: NoSQLRecords
        If key is a GeoSpatial field returns all guids that are near value which is a point specified as a JSONArray string tuple: [LONG, LAT]. maxDistance is in meters. The returned value is a AbstractRecordCursor.
        Specified by:
        selectRecordsNear in interface NoSQLRecords
        Returns:
        an AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • selectRecordsQuery

        public AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsQuery(String collection,
                                               ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                               String query)
                                        throws FailedDBOperationException
        Description copied from interface: NoSQLRecords
        Performs a query on the database and returns all guids that satisfy the query. The returned value is a AbstractRecordCursor.
        Specified by:
        selectRecordsQuery in interface NoSQLRecords
        Parameters:
        collection - the name of the collection
        valuesMapField - the field that contains the ValuesMap
        query - the query to execute

        an AbstractRecordCursor
